channel.title: Galapagos on SATO South America
channel.description: Recent content in Galapagos on SATO South America

item.title: 12 Day Machu Picchu & Galapagos Islands Experience
item.description: This 12 day Peru & Ecuador vacation package will allow you to get to enjoy two of the most spectacular highlights in South America; majestic Machu Picchu in the Andes and the curious Galapagos Islands remotely located in the Pacific Ocean. Culture and Wildlife meanwhile traveling through vibrant cities and some of the continents most spectacular sceneries. Highlights Visit the old Inca Capitals of Cusco and Quito, nowadays turned vibrant cities Explore the Sacred Valley leading to the lost city of the Incas Discover the most impressive archeological site on the continent; Machu Picchu Enjoy an island hopping program on some of the worldâ€™s most remote islands Get up-and-close with unique fauna and flora of the Galapagos Day by Day Day 1; Arrive to the City of Kings; Lima where you will spend the night
